infos.value: Lynx?
You are unharmed, my lady?
I see that my ever-worried father has sent you.
It was my decision to come, my lady.
What is it?
I have a message...for Schuzelt.
It couldn't be... Is it about Naiah?
What is it? What happened? Out with it.
Naiah...is no longer with us.
Wh-what are you saying!? That's impossible!
There was talk of you being a Leonis spy, conspiring with bandits and taking our Lady Machérie hostage.
Wh-who would breathe such foul lies into existence!?
One of King Muraga's shinobi claims to have seen the whole affair take place.
Gather yourself, Schuzelt.
Lynx... I need to hear it. Who...murdered my beloved Naiah?
Sharing that information won't be necessary, Lynx.
Loosen your tongue, or else...
I'll strike you down here and now!
Meanwhile—
Lady Machérie!?
Lord Mont, they're heading straight for us!
